name: 腾讯微博半透明去广告
去超链接下划线
鼠标悬停链接指针变化
百度网盘手机版调整
解除CSS对于选中网页元素的限制

sections.code:
span.user-name, /*百度网盘分享页*/
    .user-name.default-text, /*百度企业网盘*/
    .user-info,
    li.userbar_user>a:first-child>span,
    span.name.top-username,
    #displayUsername,
    span.u_username_title,
    span.userinfo_username,
    p.aside_user_name,
    #user,
    #pUserInfo>span:first-child,
    p.personal-url,
    div.header-tool.header-tool-user,
    #userNameCon,
    #user-name,
    #user_name,
    .username,
    #username,
    /*.user-name,*/ /*导致百度知道回答者ID消失*/
    #username_info,
    #anchor-user-name,
    div.user_name.text_overflow,
    a.top-uname,
    a.mn-lk,
    i.cmn-ellipsis,
    li[data-key='PERSONAL'] {
        display: none !important;
    }

name: Hide Baidu ID
code:
@-moz-document domain("baidu.com") {
span.user-name, /*百度网盘分享页*/
    .user-name.default-text, /*百度企业网盘*/
    .user-info,
    li.userbar_user>a:first-child>span,
    span.name.top-username,
    #displayUsername,
    span.u_username_title,
    span.userinfo_username,
    p.aside_user_name,
    #user,
    #pUserInfo>span:first-child,
    p.personal-url,
    div.header-tool.header-tool-user,
    #userNameCon,
    #user-name,
    #user_name,
    .username,
    #username,
    /*.user-name,*/ /*导致百度知道回答者ID消失*/
    #username_info,
    #anchor-user-name,
    div.user_name.text_overflow,
    a.top-uname,
    a.mn-lk,
    i.cmn-ellipsis,
    li[data-key='PERSONAL'] {
        display: none !important;
    }
}

.catchphrase{color:#757c80;font-size:12px;font-weight:700}.pubd-login .input-field{position:relative;width:300px;padding:0;border:1px solid #dfebf2;background-color:#fff;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:none}.pubd-login .input-field:first-child{border-radius:4px 4px 0 0}.pubd-login .input-field:last-child{border-radius:0 0 4px 4px;border-bottom:1px solid #dfebf2}.pubd-login .input-field input{width:290px;height:40px;color:#000;display:block;outline:0;margin:0;padding:0 0 0 10px;line-height:normal;border:none;border-radius:4px}.pubd-login .error-msg-list{list-style-type:none;padding-left:0;margin:8px auto}.pubd-login .error-msg-list-item{width:280px;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.3);margin:0 auto 2px;padding:13px 10px;font-size:14px;line-height:1.5;color:#fff;text-align:left;border:none;border-radius:4px}.pubd-login .submit{display:block;margin:0 auto 8px;width:300px;height:40px;line-height:40px;background-color:#25c6ff;color:#fff;font-weight:700;outline:0;cursor:pointer;text-align:center;text-decoration:none;border:none;border-radius:4px}.pubd-login .signup-form-nav{list-style:none;width:300px;margin:0 auto;color:#666;font-size:12px;overflow:hidden}.pubd-downthis{left:calc(50vw - 240px);top:180px;width:400px}.pubd-downthis .pubd-down-content{width:50%}.pubd-downthis dt{position:relative}.pubd-downthis .pubd-breakdown{position:absolute;bottom:0;right:0;padding:0;height:19px;line-height:11px;font-size:12px}.pubd-downthis .pubd-downthis-log{min-width:100px;min-height:40px;width:calc(100% - 10px);height:100px;resize:none}.pubd-downthis .pubd-textdown{width:calc(20% - 5px);height:50px;margin-right:5px;vertical-align:middle}.pubd-downthis .pubd-startdown{width:80%;height:50px;font-size:30px;vertical-align:middle}.pubd-downthis .pubd-downthis-textout-bar{height:calc(100% - 394px)}.pubd-downthis .pubd-downthis-textout{min-width:100px;min-height:40px;width:calc(100% - 10px);height:100%;resize:none}
